data.eml:eml: Lopharcha moriutii, sp. nov. and Polylopha cassiicola Liu & Kawabe (Lepidoptera, Tortricidae, Chlidanotinae, Polyorthini) from Thailand and Hong Kong

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nasu, Yoshitsugu (2006): Lopharcha moriutii, sp. nov. and Polylopha cassiicola Liu & Kawabe (Lepidoptera, Tortricidae, Chlidanotinae, Polyorthini) from Thailand and Hong Kong. Zootaxa 1369: 55-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174871
